functional¶

PathFinder Functional Tests.

Tests are written with py.test. Folders contain different test domains.

init_PF_test.py¶

Initialize test environment & context and upgrade SUT.

Configuration file for this test is data/qed_env.yml.

functional.init_PF_test.init_interactive(context)[source]¶

Get all object definitions from schema to be used in an interactive shell.

functional.init_PF_test.init_interactive_sa()[source]¶

Get all object definitions from schema to be used in an interactive shell.

functional.init_PF_test.setup_module(module)[source]¶

Test setup example.

functional.init_PF_test.teardown_module(module)[source]¶

Test tear-down example.

setup_PF_test.py¶

Common PathFinder configuration setup.

  • create configuration
  • create authorization
  • lock server
  • create origin
  • create PFE global configuration

Common configuration file is data/qed_env.yml. Additional configuration for this test is setup_PF.yml file.
